com.bigdata.ha.msg

Interface IHASendState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HASendState

    public interface IHASendState
extends Serializable
    Interface for the state of the sender of an IHAMessage.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getMarker()
      A byte[] marker that must prefix the message payload, needed to skip stale data from failed read tasks.
      long getMessageId()
      A unique (one-up) message sequence identifier for the messages from the sender.
      UUID getOriginalSenderId()
      The UUID of the originating service.
      long getQuorumToken()
      The current quorum token on the sender.
      int getReplicationFactor()
      The current replication factor on the sender.
      UUID getSenderId()
      The UUID of the sending service.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageId

        long getMessageId()
        A unique (one-up) message sequence identifier for the messages from the sender. This identifier may be used to verify that the bytes available from the replication stream are associated with the designed payload.

      • getOriginalSenderId

        UUID getOriginalSenderId()
        The UUID of the originating service. This may be used to verify that a message was sourced the expected quorum leader.

      • getSenderId

        UUID getSenderId()
        The UUID of the sending service. This may be used to verify that a message was sourced the expected upstream service.

      • getQuorumToken

        long getQuorumToken()
        The current quorum token on the sender.

      • getReplicationFactor

        int getReplicationFactor()
        The current replication factor on the sender.

      • getMarker

        byte[] getMarker()
        A byte[] marker that must prefix the message payload, needed to skip stale data from failed read tasks.
